channel.title: ErasedPKz client help
channel.description: okay so i have always had this problem with the cachedownloader, it downloads it and unpacks about 9 things but not the full file so im getting a file not found error and please don't tell me to put the cache in my C:\ folder because i want other people to connect and be able to play my server without having to download it then put it in the C:\ folder im using erased pkz client and server my msn is : nathanw26@live.co.uk and skype : dj_-_timez thanks in advance.

item.title: ErasedPKz client help

item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

well download the full cache, and upload it, put that link in cachedownload and change the directory in signlink.java

item.description:
